select ai.id, ai.order_id, ai.remark, ai.create_date, ai.del_flag,
oi.code as orderCode, oi.materials_code, oi.total_price, oi.status,
si.code as supplierCode, si.name as supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images as supplierImages,
mi.name as materialsName, mi.model, mi.images as materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit,
ppi.purchase_num from abnormal_info ai left join order_info oi on (oi.id = ai.order_id ) left join supplier_info si on (si.id = oi.supplier_id ) left join materials_info mi on (mi.code = oi.materials_code ) LEFT JOIN purchase_plan_info ppi ON (ppi.id = oi.plan_id) where 1 = 1 AND ai.del_flag = 0
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND oi.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.orderCode},"%")
order by ai.create_date desc
